experience.institution: Centre for Systems & Software Engineering, USC
description: Working on automatic generation of analysis class diagrams from use case specifications for the project ,”Extensions for Executable Domain Models” which aims to generate code for micro services infrastructure.
Initial domain model extracted from user stories based on Pos-Tags and Type Dependencies.
Preprocessed and Structured Data of various taxpayers
Implemented K-mean Clustering algorithm to detect those who were paying less tax.
